amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that no funds appropriated by this Act can be used to implement, administer, or enforce Davis-Bacon prevailing rate wage requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 238 (Roll no. 448).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 238 (Roll no. 448).
